GlideAjaxHelper.prototype = {
  initialize: function () {

  getStringFromParameter: function (parameter) {
    if (!parameter) {
      return '';
    }

    return String(parameter);
  },

};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-19 10:35:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>deb342c41ba40e106f0cebde6e4bcb3b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GlideAjaxHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_deb342c41ba40e106f0cebde6e4bcb3b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-24 12:50:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_174fadbe1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcbe4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script><![CDATA[function isArrayWithKeyValuePairs(variable) {
    // Check if the variable is an array
    if (!(variable instanceof Array)) {
        return false;
    }
	// Check if every element in the array is an key/value pair object
	var retVal = true;
	variable.forEach(function(item) {
		if (typeof item !== 'object' || item.Key === undefined || item.Value === undefined) {
			retVal = false;
		}
	});
	return retVal;
}

window.addEventListener('message', function (e) {
	// Don't execute request if event origin is not coming from the cnxFrame
	try {
		if (e.origin !== new URL(document.getElementById('root').src).origin) {
			return;
		}
	} catch (e) {
		return;
	}

	if (!e.data.type || (!e.data.parameters && !e.data.data)) {
		return;
	}

	if (e.data.type === 'GlideAjax' && e.data.parameters.name && Array.isArray(e.data.parameters.parameters) && e.ports.length) {
		if (e.data.parameters.scope !== 'x_caci_crm_wxcc') {
			e.ports[0].postMessage({
				success: false,
				result: 'Invalid scope'
			});
			
			return;
		}
		var ga = new GlideAjax(e.data.parameters.scope + '.' + e.data.parameters.name);
		
		if (e.data.parameters.name == 'ConfigurationProcessor') {
			var gadgetConfigOpenFrame = [];
			var gaOpenFrameUtility = new GlideAjax('sn_openframe.OpenFrameAjaxUtility');
			gaOpenFrameUtility.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getOpenFrameConfiguration');
			gaOpenFrameUtility.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
				var openFrameConfigJson = '';
				try {
					openFrameConfigJson = JSON.parse(response).config.configuration || '';
					gadgetConfigOpenFrame = JSON.parse(openFrameConfigJson);
					if (!isArrayWithKeyValuePairs(gadgetConfigOpenFrame)) {
						throw new Exception('Invalid syntax (not an array of kvp)');
					}
					gadgetConfigOpenFrame.push({ Key: 'snVersion', Value: storeAppVersion });
					gadgetConfigOpenFrame.push({ Key: 'snInstalledFromStore', Value: isStoreApp });
				} catch (e) {
					gadgetConfigOpenFrame = [];
					gadgetConfigOpenFrame.push({ Key: 'invalidJson', Value: openFrameConfigJson });
				}

				var responseText = JSON.stringify(gadgetConfigOpenFrame);
				e.ports[0].postMessage({
					success: true,
					result: responseText
				});
			});
			return;
		}
		if (e.data.parameters.name == 'CurrentUrlReader') {
			e.ports[0].postMessage({
				success: true,
				result: window.top.location.href
			});
			return;
		}
		e.data.parameters.parameters.forEach(function(param) {
			ga.addParam(param.Key, param.Value);
		});

		ga.setErrorCallback(function(error) {
			e.ports[0].postMessage({
				success: false,
				result: error
			});
		});

		ga.getXML(function(response) {
			var responseText = new XMLSerializer().serializeToString(response.responseXML.documentElement);
			e.ports[0].postMessage({
				success: true,
				result: responseText
			});
		});
	}
	if (e.data.type === 'CustomEvent') {
		CustomEvent.fireAll(e.data.parameters.eventName, e.data.parameters.eventData);			
	}

	if (e.data.type === 'OpenFrame' && e.data.parameters.action && Array.isArray(e.data.parameters.params)) {
		if (e.data.parameters.action === 'init') {
			if (!e.ports.length) {
				return;
			}
			openFrameAPI.init({}, function(config) {
				e.ports[0].postMessage({
					event: 'init',
					context: config
				});
				e.data.parameters.params.forEach(function(subscription) {
					openFrameAPI.subscribe(subscription, function (context) {
						var message = {
							context: context,
							event: subscription
						};
						e.ports[0].postMessage(message);
					});
				});

			}, function(error) {
				e.ports[0].postMessage(error);
			});
		} else {
			if (e.data.parameters.action === 'setPresenceIndicator') {
				openFrameAPI.setPresenceIndicator(e.data.parameters.params[0], e.data.parameters.params[1]);
			}
			else {
				openFrameAPI[e.data.parameters.action].apply(null, e.data.parameters.params);
			}
		}
	}
});
]]></client_script><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint>x_caci_crm_wxcc_gadget.do</endpoint><html><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
  <g2:evaluate>
	var nowVersion = gs.getProperty('glide.buildtag.last');
	if (!nowVersion) {
		nowVersion = gs.getProperty('glide.war');
	}
	var cnxFrameUrl = gs.getProperty('x_caci_crm_wxcc.gadget_path');
	if (!cnxFrameUrl) {
		cnxFrameUrl = 'https://wxcc-crmconnectors.ciscoccservice.com/servicenow/connector/v1/index.html';
	}

	var version = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
	var isStoreApp = new VersionProcessor().isInstalledFromStore(); 
	var snowUrl = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
	var polarisEnabled = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.polaris.experience');
	var userId = gs.getUserID();
	var toggle = encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify({
		awaChatWorkloadPolling: gs.getProperty('x_caci_crm_wxcc.toggle.awa_chat_workload_polling', false),
		logNetwork: gs.getProperty('x_caci_crm_wxcc.toggle.log_network', true)
	}));
  	  
  </g2:evaluate>
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
	
	<!-- OpenFrame Latest Version -->
	<script src="/scripts/openframe/latest/openFrameAPI.min.js?v=$[JS:version]"></script>
	
	<script>
		//Used to prevent the gadget from being loaded in the main frame.
		try{
			if (window.name !== "gsft_openframe" ${AND} window.name !== "CNX_Redux") {
				// the page is not loaded in a openframe of a UI16 view 
				if (window.frameElement.attributes.getNamedItem('aria-label').value.toLowerCase() !== "openframe") {
					// the page is also not loaded in an openframe of a workspace view
					window.location.href = 'home.do';								
				}
			}
		} catch(e){
			window.location.href = 'home.do';
		}
		
		var styleSheetCount = 0;
		
		while(document.styleSheets[styleSheetCount] !== undefined){
			document.styleSheets[styleSheetCount].disabled = true;			
			styleSheetCount++;	
		}
	</script>
	  	  
	<!-- Custom Bootstrap overwrites -->
	<link href="4cc9d887dbe08210999d8c3b13961927.cssdbx?v=$[JS:version]" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"></link>
  </head>
  <body>
	<iframe id="root" allow="microphone *"></iframe>
	  
	<script>
		var storeAppVersion = '$[JS:version]';
		var isStoreApp = '$[JS:isStoreApp]';
		
		// Used to set the iframe src because otherwise the parent window is not accessible
		var parentPathName = parent.window.location.pathname;
		
		window.onload = function() {
			document.getElementById('root').src = '$[JS:cnxFrameUrl]?toggle=$[JS:toggle]${AMP}userId=$[JS:userId]${AMP}snowUrl=$[JS:snowUrl]${AMP}parentPathName=' + parentPathName + '${AMP}polarisEnabled=$[JS:polarisEnabled]${AMP}isAwaWorkspace=true';
			document.getElementById('root').setAttribute("allow", "microphone *");
		};

	</script>
  </body>
</j:jelly>]]></html><name>gadget</name><processing_script/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-15 12:48:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>174fadbe1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcbe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>130</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gadget</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_page_174fadbe1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcbe4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-16 12:05:42</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_dbf5c2c41ba40e106f0cebde6e4bcb48
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_caci_crm_wxcc.InteractionProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>API to create / update Interactions.</description><name>InteractionProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[var InteractionProcessor = Class.create();
var associationObjectHelper = function (interaction) {
  var interactionId = interaction.getUniqueValue();
  var relatedRecords = [];

  if (interaction.opened_for) {
    relatedRecords.push({
      baseTable: 'sys_user',
      table: 'sys_user',
      id: interaction.getValue('opened_for'),
      value: interaction.opened_for.getDisplayValue()
    });
  }

  if (interaction.account) {
    relatedRecords.push({
      baseTable: 'core_company',
      table: 'customer_account',
      id: interaction.getValue('account'),
      value: interaction.account.getDisplayValue()
    });
  }

  if (interaction.contact) {
    relatedRecords.push({
      baseTable: 'sys_user',
      table: 'customer_contact',
      id: interaction.getValue('contact'),
      value: interaction.contact.getDisplayValue()
    });
  }

  if (interaction.consumer) {
    relatedRecords.push({
      baseTable: 'csm_consumer',
      table: 'csm_consumer',
      id: interaction.getValue('consumer'),
      value: interaction.consumer.getDisplayValue()
    });
  }

  var relatedRecord = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction_related_record');
  relatedRecord.addQuery('interaction=' + interactionId + '^ORDERBYsys_created_on');
  relatedRecord.query();
  while (relatedRecord.next()) {
    var table = relatedRecord.getValue('document_table');
    var tableHierarchy = new GlideTableHierarchy(table);
    var baseTable = tableHierarchy.getBase();

    relatedRecords.push({
      baseTable: baseTable,
      table: table,
      id: relatedRecord.getValue('document_id'),
      value: relatedRecord.document_id.getDisplayValue()
    });
  }
  return relatedRecords;
};

InteractionProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getOrCreate: function () {
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();

    // Check gadget version
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (!new VersionProcessor().checkVersion(version)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var workitemid = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_workitemid'));
    var intType = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_interactiontype')) || 'phone';
    var intDirection = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_direction')) || 'inbound';

    var daysThreshold = 10;
    var interactionContext = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction_context');
    interactionContext.addQuery('name', 'workitemId');
    interactionContext.addQuery('value', workitemid);
    interactionContext.addQuery('sys_created_on', '>=', gs.daysAgo(daysThreshold));
    interactionContext.query();

    var sysId = '';
    gs.info(workitemid + ' ' + intType + ' ' + intDirection);
    if (!interactionContext.next()) {
      gs.info('create new interaction');
      var interactionObj = sn_interaction.Interaction.create({
        type: intType,
        context: {
          workitemId: workitemid
        },
        channel_metadata: {},
        application: '290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c'
      });

      // unfortunately the direction can not be set on the creation
      // and if we do not set the application to our own (b+s Connects)
      // Agent Workspace will overwrite it which will prevent us from updating
      // the interaction.
      // Therefore use GlideRecord instead of GlideRecordSecure, otherwise the application
      // will not get set.
      var interaction = new GlideRecord('interaction');
      var interactionExists = interaction.get(interactionObj.sys_id);
      if (interactionExists) {
        gs.info('interactionExists');
        interaction.setValue('direction', intDirection);
        interaction.setValue('application', '290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c');
        interaction.update();
      }
      sysId = interactionObj.sys_id;
    } else {
      gs.info('else');
      sysId = interactionContext.getValue('interaction');
    }
    return JSON.stringify({
      systemId: sysId,
      workitemid: workitemid
    });
  },
  updateInteraction: function () {
    // HELPERS
    var escapeRegex = function (regex) {
      return regex.replace(/[\-\[\]\/\{\}\(\)\*\+\?\.\\\^\$\|]/g, '\\$&');
    };

    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();

    // Check gadget version
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (!new VersionProcessor().checkVersion(version)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var direction = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_direction'));
    var interactionId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_interactionid'));
    var state = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_state'));
    var activityRecordMapping = JSON.parse(gs.base64Decode(gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_activity_mapping')) || '[]'));
    var nonAbandoned = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_non_abandoned'));
    var consultTransferred = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_consult_transferred'));

    var interaction = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction');
    var interactionExists = interaction.get(interactionId);

    var sysid = '';

    if (!interactionExists) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        error: 'interactionMissing',
        message: 'Interaction could not be found.'
      });
    }
    var user = gs.getUserID();

    if (!interaction.assigned_to) {
      interaction.assigned_to = user;
      interaction.update();
    }

    var canChange = interaction.assigned_to.toString() === user;

    if (canChange && direction) {
      interaction.setValue('direction', direction);
    }

    switch (true) {
    // Always assign the user that gets offered the call
    case state === 'Offered':
      interaction.assigned_to = user;
      break;
      // In case of consult (warm) transfer workitem state will never be "Offered" on Agent B side. Therefore we have to assign the interaction here.
    case state === 'Active' && consultTransferred === 'true':
      interaction.assigned_to = user;
      interaction.state = 'work_in_progress';
      break;
    case state === 'Active' && canChange:
      // Intended Fallthrough
    case state === 'Wrapup' && canChange:
      interaction.state = 'work_in_progress';
      break;
    case state === 'Paused' && canChange:
      interaction.state = 'on_hold';
      break;
    case state === 'Ended' && canChange && interaction.state.toString() === 'new' && !nonAbandoned:
      // The agent was not involved, therefore change the state to closed abandoned.
      interaction.state = 'closed_abandoned';
      break;
    case state === 'Ended' && canChange:
      interaction.state = 'closed_complete';
      break;
    case state === 'EndedAbandoned':
      // set state to new (RONA)
      interaction.state = 'new';
      interaction.assigned_to = '';
      break;
    case state === 'EndedUnknown':
      interaction.assigned_to = '';
      break;
    default:
      break;
    }

    // CTI Data Mapping
    // update record with data from configured mapping
    for (var i = 0; i < activityRecordMapping.length; i++) {
      var mapping = activityRecordMapping[i];
      var mappingFieldValid = interaction.isValidField(mapping.Key);
      if (!mappingFieldValid) {
        return JSON.stringify({
          error: 'Could not write value to interaction. Field "' + mapping.Key + '" does not exist.'
        });
      }
      interaction[mapping.Key] = mapping.Value;
    }

    // update the interaction if it should get updated
    sysid = interaction.update();

    var relatedRecords = associationObjectHelper(interaction);
    if (sysid) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        systemId: sysid,
        relatedRecords: relatedRecords
      });
    }

    return JSON.stringify({
      error: 'updateInteractionStateFailed',
      message: 'Could not update the interaction state.'
    });
  },
  associateObject: function () {
    // Check gadget version
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (!new VersionProcessor().checkVersion(version)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var interactionId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_interactionid'));
    var table = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_table'));
    var objectId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_object_id'));
    var isParticipantLookup = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_is_participant_lookup')) === 'true';

    var interaction = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction');
    var interactionExists = interaction.get(interactionId);

    var sysid = '';

    if (!interactionExists) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        error: 'Could not find interaction.'
      });
    }

    switch (table) {
    case 'sys_user':
      if (interaction.opened_for.toString() !== objectId) {
        interaction.opened_for = objectId;
      }
      break;

    case 'customer_account':
      if (interaction.account.toString() !== objectId) {
        interaction.account = objectId;
      }
      break;

    case 'customer_contact':
      if (interaction.contact.toString() !== objectId) {
        interaction.contact = objectId;
      }
      break;

    case 'csm_consumer':
      if (interaction.consumer.toString() !== objectId) {
        interaction.consumer = objectId;
      }
      break;

    default:

      var tableHierarchy = new GlideTableHierarchy(table);
      var baseTable = tableHierarchy.getBase();

      var relatedRecord = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction_related_record');
      relatedRecord.addQuery('interaction', interactionId);

      switch (baseTable) {
      case 'task':
        if (isParticipantLookup) {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('type', 'task');
          relatedRecord.query();
          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            relatedRecord.task = objectId;
            relatedRecord.update();
            break;
          }
        } else {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('task', objectId);
          relatedRecord.query();

          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            break;
          }
        }

        relatedRecord.initialize();
        relatedRecord.interaction = interactionId;
        relatedRecord.task = objectId;
        relatedRecord.type = 'task';
        relatedRecord.insert();
        break;

      case 'kb_knowledge':
        if (isParticipantLookup) {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('type', 'knowledge');
          relatedRecord.query();
          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            relatedRecord.knowledge_article = objectId;
            relatedRecord.update();
            break;
          }
        } else {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('knowledge_article', objectId);
          relatedRecord.query();

          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            break;
          }
        }

        relatedRecord.initialize();
        relatedRecord.interaction = interactionId;
        relatedRecord.knowledge_article = objectId;
        relatedRecord.type = 'knowledge';
        relatedRecord.insert();
        break;

      default:
        // replace the existing record with the same document_table in case the assignment was made automatically (participant lookup)
        if (isParticipantLookup) {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('document_table', table);
          relatedRecord.query();
          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            relatedRecord.document_id = objectId;
            relatedRecord.update();
            break;
          }
        } else {
          relatedRecord.addQuery('document_id', objectId);
          relatedRecord.query();

          if (relatedRecord.next()) {
            break;
          }
        }

        relatedRecord.initialize();
        relatedRecord.interaction = interactionId;
        // Do not reference the basetable
        relatedRecord.document_table = table;
        relatedRecord.document_id = objectId;
        relatedRecord.type = baseTable;
        relatedRecord.insert();
      }
    }

    // update the interaction
    sysid = interaction.update();
    var relatedRecords = associationObjectHelper(interaction);

    if (sysid) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        systemId: sysid,
        relatedRecords: relatedRecords
      });
    }

    return JSON.stringify({
      error: 'associationFailed',
      message: 'Could not associate to the interaction.'
    });
  },
  addNote: function () {
    // Check gadget version
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (!new VersionProcessor().checkVersion(version)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var interactionId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_interactionid'));
    var note = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_note'));
    if (!interactionId) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        error: 'interactionIdMissing',
        message: 'Interaction Id is missing.'
      });
    }

    var sysId = '';

    try {
      var interaction = new GlideRecordSecure('interaction');
      var interactionExists = interaction.get(interactionId);

      if (!interactionExists) {
        return JSON.stringify({
          error: 'interactionMissing',
          message: 'Interaction could not be found.'
        });
      }
      // add note to work notes
      interaction.work_notes = note;
      // update interaction
      sysId = interaction.update();
    } catch (e) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        error: 'addNoteError',
        message: e.message
      });
    }
    return JSON.stringify({
      systemId: sysId,
      note: note
    });
  },

  type: 'InteractionProcessor'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-19 10:48:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>dbf5c2c41ba40e106f0cebde6e4bcb48</sys_id><sys_mod_count>126</sys_mod_count><sys_name>InteractionProcessor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dbf5c2c41ba40e106f0cebde6e4bcb48</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-17 10:11:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_888596041be40e106f0cebde6e4bcb31
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_caci_crm_wxcc.LookupProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Fetches the lookup records based on the Service Layout.</description><name>LookupProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[var LookupProcessor = Class.create();
LookupProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getParticipants: function () {
  
    /**
     * Helper functions
     */
    var parser = function (query, paramString) {
      var replacedQuery = query.replace(/[\[]/, '\\\[').replace(/[\]]/, '\\\]');

      var expr = '[\\?&]' + replacedQuery + '=([^&#]*)';
      var regex = new RegExp(expr);
      var results = regex.exec(paramString);

      if (results !== null) {
        return results[1];
      }

      return '';
    };

    var getFieldsFromResultString = function (resultString) {
      return resultString.match(/(\${)([^}]*)/g).map(function (e) {
        return e.replace('${', '');
      });
    };

    var escapeRegex = function (regex) {
      return regex.replace(/[\-\[\]\/\{\}\(\)\*\+\?\.\\\^\$\|]/g, '\\$&');
    };

    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();

    /**
     * Check gadget version
     */
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (!new VersionProcessor().checkVersion(version)) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    /**
     * Get data for placeholders in query
     */
    var ani = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_ani'));
    var ctiData = JSON.parse(gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_ctidata')));

    /**
     * query the lookup data
     */
    var prTable = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_table'));
    var prQuery = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_query'));
    var prResult = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_resultfields'));
    
    var sysId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_sysId'));

    var prLimit = 5;
    var result;

    var lg = new GlideRecordSecure(prTable);

    if (sysId !== '') {
      // In case it's a sys_id directly search for it
      lg.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
      lg.query();
    } else {
      var escapedRegex = new RegExp(escapeRegex('${ani}'), 'gi');
      var query = prQuery.replace(escapedRegex, ani);

      for (var key in ctiData) {
        if (ctiData.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
          escapedRegex = new RegExp(escapeRegex('${' + key + '}'), 'gi');
          query = query.replace(escapedRegex, ctiData[key]);
        }
      }

      lg.setLimit(prLimit);
      lg.addEncodedQuery(query);
      lg.query();
    }

    var elements = getFieldsFromResultString(prResult);

    if (prResult.charAt(0) !== '&') {
      prResult = '&' + prResult;
    }

    result = [];

    while (lg.next()) {
      var recordResult = prResult;

      for (i = 0, il = elements.length; i < il; i++) {
        if (recordResult.indexOf(elements[i]) === -1) {
          continue;
        }
        recordResult = recordResult.replace(
          '${' + elements[i] + '}',
          gs.base64Encode(lg.getDisplayValue(elements[i]))
        );
      }
      result.push({
        Id: lg.getValue('sys_id'),
        Table: prTable,
        Name: parser('Field1', recordResult),
        Role: parser('Field2', recordResult),
        Company: parser('Field3', recordResult)
      });
    }

    return JSON.stringify(result);

  },
  type: 'LookupProcessor'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-19 11:52:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>888596041be40e106f0cebde6e4bcb31</sys_id><sys_mod_count>43</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LookupProcessor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_888596041be40e106f0cebde6e4bcb31</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-07 12:49:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_css"><content_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>gadget_stylesheet</name><style>html, body, #root {
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  width: 100%;
}

#root {
  border: none;
  position: fixed;
}

html, body {
  overflow: hidden;
}

body {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center 50px;
	background-color: white;
    background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1' height='50px' width='200px'><text x='0' y='15' fill='gray' font-size='18'>Waiting for ServiceNow...</text></svg>");
}

/* hides any content besides our gadget */
body > *:not(#root) {
  display: none;
}
</style><sys_class_name>content_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-28 10:34:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>4cc9d887dbe08210999d8c3b13961927</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gadget_stylesheet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>content_css_4cc9d887dbe08210999d8c3b13961927</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-15 07:15:54</sys_updated_on><type>local</type><url/></content_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f426fd0c1b640e106f0cebde6e4bcb3f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_caci_crm_wxcc.AwaProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Script for logic around the Advanced Work Assignment integration.</description><name>AwaProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[var AwaProcessor = Class.create();

var getTimeInState = function () {
  var currentUser = gs.getUser().getID();
  var sa = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_agent_presence');
  sa.addQuery('agent', currentUser);
  sa.query();

  if (sa.next()) {
    return {
      date: new Date(new GlideDateTime(sa.getValue('sys_updated_on')).getNumericValue()).toISOString(),
      stateId: sa.getValue('current_presence_state')
    };
  }
  return null;
};

var getBooleanFromValue = function (value) {
  return value === '1' ? 'true' : 'false';
};

AwaProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getPresenceState: function () {
    // Check gadget version
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (version !== compareVersion) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var agent = sn_awa.Agent.get(gs.getUserID());
    var presence = agent.getPresence();
    var timeInState = getTimeInState();
    presence.date = timeInState.date;
    return JSON.stringify(presence);
  },
  
  getTimeInState: function () {
    return JSON.stringify(getTimeInState());
  },
  
  setPresenceState: function () {
    // Check gadget version
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (version !== compareVersion) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var state = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_state'));
    var agent = sn_awa.Agent.get(gs.getUserID());
    var channel = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_channel_id'));
    var channels = [];
    if (channel) {
      var available = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_channel_available')) === 'true';
      channels.push({
        sys_id: channel,
        available: available
      });
    }
    var presence = agent.setPresence({
      sys_id: state,
      channels: channels
    });
    return JSON.stringify(presence);
  },

  getAwaStates: function () {
    // Check gadget version
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var version = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_version'));
    var compareVersion = new VersionProcessor().getVersion();
    if (version !== compareVersion) {
      return JSON.stringify({
        versionMismatch: 'Current Version: ' + version + '; New Version: ' + compareVersion
      });
    }

    var states = [];
    var sa = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_presence_state');
    sa.addQuery('active', true);
    sa.query();

    while (sa.next()) {
      if (sa.getValue('apply_to_all_groups') !== '1') {
        var groups = sa.getValue('apply_to_groups');
        var currentUser = gs.getUser();
        if (!groups) {
          continue;
        }
        var isInGroup = false;
        var groupArray = groups.split(',');
        for (var i = 0; i < groupArray.length; i++) {
          if (currentUser.isMemberOf(groupArray[i])) {
            isInGroup = true;
          }
        }
        if (!isInGroup) {
          continue;
        }
      }
      var channels = [];
      if (getBooleanFromValue(sa.getValue('show_channels')) === 'true') {
        var channelList = sa.getValue('service_channels');
        var restrictedChannels = sa.getValue('restrict_agent_update');
        if (channelList) {
          var channelArray = channelList.split(',');
          for (var j = 0; j < channelArray.length; j++) {
            var sc = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_service_channel');
            var channelExists = sc.get(channelArray[j]);
            if (channelExists) {
              var restricted = false;
              if (restrictedChannels) {
                restricted = restrictedChannels.indexOf(channelArray[j]) !== -1;
              }
              var available = false;
              var aca = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_agent_channel_availability');
              aca.addQuery('agent', gs.getUserID());
              aca.addQuery('service_channel', sc.getUniqueValue());
              aca.addQuery('presence_state', sa.getUniqueValue());
              aca.query();
              if (aca.next()) {
                available = aca.getValue('available') === '1';
              }
              var channel = {
                name: sc.getValue('name'),
                id: sc.getUniqueValue(),
                restrictAgentUpdate: restricted,
                available: available
              };
              channels.push(channel);
            }
          }
        }
      }
      var state = {
        sys_id: sa.getValue('sys_id'),
        name: sa.getValue('name'),
        available: sa.getValue('available_to_receive_work_items') === '1',
        channels: channels
      };
      states.push(state);
    }
    return JSON.stringify(states);
  },

  getAwaInboxResult: function () {
    var gaHelper = new GlideAjaxHelper();
    var serviceChannelId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_service_channel_id'));
    var documentId = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_document_id'));
    var documentTable = gaHelper.getStringFromParameter(this.getParameter('sysparm_document_table'));

    var sa = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_inbox_layout');
    sa.addQuery('service_channel', serviceChannelId);
    sa.orderBy('order');
    sa.query();
    while (sa.next()) {
      var fieldName1 = sa.getValue('field_1');
      var fieldName2 = sa.getValue('field_2');
      var fieldName3 = sa.getValue('field_3');
      var fieldName4 = sa.getValue('field_4');
      var fieldName5 = sa.getValue('field_5');

      var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(documentTable);
      var docExists = gr.get(documentId);
      if (!docExists) {
        continue;
      }
      if (sa.getValue('condition')) {
        if (!GlideFilter.checkRecord(gr, sa.getValue('condition'))) {
          continue;
        }
      }

      return JSON.stringify({
        displayValue: gr.getDisplayValue(),
        field1: gr.getDisplayValue(fieldName1),
        field2: gr.getDisplayValue(fieldName2),
        field3: gr.getDisplayValue(fieldName3),
        field4: gr.getDisplayValue(fieldName4),
        field5: gr.getDisplayValue(fieldName5)
      });
    }
    return null;
  },

  getActiveAwaWorkItems: function () {

    var workItems = [];
    var sa = new GlideRecordSecure('awa_work_item');
    sa.addQuery('active', true);
    sa.addQuery('state', 'pending_accept');
    sa.addQuery('assigned_to', gs.getUserID());
    sa.query();

    while (sa.next()) {
      var workItem = {
        sys_id: sa.getUniqueValue(),
        size: sa.getValue('size'),
        serviceChannel: {
          name: sa.getDisplayValue('queue.service_channel'),
          sys_id: sa.getElement('queue.service_channel').toString()
        },
        document: {
          sys_id: sa.getValue('document_id'),
          table: sa.getValue('document_table')
        }
      };
      workItems.push(workItem);
    }

    return JSON.stringify(workItems);
  },
  type: 'AwaProcessor'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-19 09:36:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>f426fd0c1b640e106f0cebde6e4bcb3f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AwaProcessor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f426fd0c1b640e106f0cebde6e4bcb3f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-07 12:37:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1e3916c41be40e106f0cebde6e4bcbf5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_caci_crm_wxcc.VersionProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Returns the installed version of the application b+s Connects for ServiceNow.</description><name>VersionProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[// this script is using GlideRecord and not GlideRecordSecure because otherwise Agents would not be able to access
// the version of the store app
var VersionProcessor = Class.create();
VersionProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getVersionName: function () {
    return 'OEM-01';
  },
  checkVersion: function (version) {
    var grSysStoreApp = new GlideRecord('sys_store_app');
    grSysStoreApp.addQuery('scope', 'x_caci_crm_wxcc');
    grSysStoreApp.addQuery('version', version);
    grSysStoreApp.query();
    if (grSysStoreApp.next()) {
      return true;
    }
    var grSysApp = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
    grSysApp.addQuery('scope', 'x_caci_crm_wxcc');
    grSysApp.addQuery('version', version);
    grSysApp.query();
    if (grSysApp.next()) {
      return true;
    }

    return false;
  },
  isInstalledFromStore: function (version) {
    var grSysStoreApp = new GlideRecord('sys_store_app');
    grSysStoreApp.addQuery('scope', 'x_caci_crm_wxcc');
    grSysStoreApp.addQuery('version', version);
    grSysStoreApp.query();
    if (grSysStoreApp.next()) {
      return true;
    }
    return false;
  },
  getVersion: function () {
    var grSysStoreApp = new GlideRecord('sys_store_app');
    grSysStoreApp.addQuery('scope', 'x_caci_crm_wxcc');
    grSysStoreApp.query();
    var version = '';
    if (grSysStoreApp.next()) {
      version = grSysStoreApp.getValue('version');
    } else {
      var grSysApp = new GlideRecord('sys_app');
      grSysApp.addQuery('scope', 'x_caci_crm_wxcc');
      grSysApp.query();
      if (grSysApp.next()) {
        version = grSysApp.getValue('version');
      }
    }
    return version.toString();
  },
  getDocumentationVersion: function () {
    var version = this.getVersion();
    var splittedVersion = version.split('.');
    if (splittedVersion[2] && splittedVersion[2] !== '0') {
      version = splittedVersion[0] + '.' + splittedVersion[1] + '.0';
    }
    return version.toString();
  },
  type: 'VersionProcessor'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-19 12:09:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>1e3916c41be40e106f0cebde6e4bcbf5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>VersionProcessor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center" source="x_caci_crm_wxcc">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Webex Contact Center">290ea97e1b5c0a106f0cebde6e4bcb6c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e3916c41be40e106f0cebde6e4bcbf5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-01 13:06:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
